pages.title: Furious
pages.text: $(l)Furious$() is a $(l)treasure$() enchantment that is applicable on armor pieces. $(br)Depending on the level of the enchantment, when the user is damaged it will provide the user with different effects.

I:$(li)Strength I - 23 seconds.$()$(br)II:$(li)Strength I - 23 seconds.$()$(li)Speed I - 23 seconds.$()$(br)III:$(li)Strength II - 23 seconds.$()$(li)Speed I - 46 seconds.$()$(br)IV:$(li)Strength III - 30 seconds.$()$(li)Speed II - 60 seconds.$()
